881303552696414290.NewbieWelcomeTemplate: Welcome, {0}! Before you can become a full member, we wanna know a bit about you. Please enter **/apply member** to start!

Questions.Content: Have you read, understood and acknowledged our very simple server rules?
What is your mother tongue (native language)?
Are you fluent in English **without** a machine translator (like Google Translate)?
Where did you hear about this Discord server (Google search, specific website, GitHub, ...)?
Why would you like to join (need support with a project, just looking, sharing memes, ...)?
